name: GDG Game Jam game made in 4 hours probably instead of 48, sue me
name_original: GDG Game Jam game made in 4 hours probably instead of 48, sue me
description:
And here we have an elegantly buggy game about climbing a tower or smth idk

To play it just run the exe (prolly only works on windows) then jump off into the water then press play then play for one round until you die and get as high as you can (there's only three modules of platforms, I was gonna have many more and more variety but fuck you) and then when you die if you want to play again (idk why you would) then quit the game and start it back up because I didn't delete the platforms from your last run
